allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Initial commit - Zapdesk Lightning tipping widget

- React-based Bitcoin Lightning tipping widget for Zendesk Help Center
- Dynamic QR code generation with real Lightning invoices
- Configurable tip amounts (100, 1000, 10,000 sats)
- Integration with Wallet of Satoshi
- Production build ready for deployment

Built with React, Vite, and Lightning Network APIs
EOF
)")

Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Fix agent fetching with improved error handling and logging

- Add comprehensive console logging for debugging
- Wait for ZAFClient to load before initialization
- Improve error messages to identify issues
- Better async/await flow for API calls
- Fetch agent from /api/v2/requests/{ticketId} endpoint
- Display clear error states when widget fails to load

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")
